items.name: solami
descriptions: look:You feel the oily goodness of actual meat in your hands.
location:strapped to a table.

items.name: sausage
descriptions: look:You see a long, meaty sausage, and it reminds you of when you had real food.
location:strapped to a table

items.name: spam
descriptions: look:You see the classic can of spam sitting in front of you, and you wonder what kind of meat is in this one.
location:in a cupboard

items.name: water jug
descriptions: look:You see some water in a strange looking jug, it feels cool.
location:strapped to a table

items.name: plastic water bottle
descriptions: look:This plastic water bottle appears to be a waste of valuble materials.
location:strapped to a table

items.name: small water bottle
descriptions: look:This water bottle is small, and slightly cool.
location:strapped to a table

items.name: freeze dried fruits
descriptions: look:The freeze dried fruits look sweet, but they are very dry and crumbly.
location:in a bowl velcro-ed to a table

items.name: cereal
descriptions: look:Light, crispy cereal runs through your fingers.
location:in a cupboard

items.name: frying pan
descriptions: look:A cool solid steel cast-iron pan.
location:on a table

items.name: fork
descriptions: look:A nice four-pronged fork.
location:in a drawer

items.name: pantry keycard
descriptions: look:A small card with a magnetic barcode on the back
location:in a drawer
